active_skill.name: The Curtain Falls
active_skill.description:
Fire a series of random cards using a magic gun, each triggering different effects based on card type:

Hearts – Deals massive Physical DMG. Spades – Deals Physical DMG and inflicts massive Daze.

Crowns – Deals Ether DMG and accumulates massive Ether Anomaly Buildup.

additional_ability.name: Master of Disguise
additional_ability.description:
When there is at least 1 Mockingbird character in the squad: When the on-field Agent in the squad meets the Specialty requirements, the Active Skill fires a fixed card with a buff:

Attack: Fires only Hearts, increasing the DMG by 45%/56%/67%/78%/90%.

Stun: Fires only Spades, increasing the Daze buildup by 27%/34%/40%/47%/54%.

Anomaly: Fires only Crowns, increasing the Anomaly Buildup by 90%/112.5%/135%/157.5%/180%.

chain_attack.name: Show Time!
chain_attack.description: Throws a magic grenade forward, dealing Ether DMG and inflicting Ether Anomaly Buildup.
